long_description: The Petzl Djinn Quickdraw Set is a reliable, durable solution for your initiation to outdoor climbing. It has a durable Axess sling and 2 Djinn carabiners with key lock noses for quick clipping. Carabiners have H-shaped profiles that offer a great strength-to-weight ratio. Wide rope-bearing surfaces on the 'biners are designed to promote rope glide and reduce wear on the 'biner. Key lock noses won't snag on pro, ropes or slings, making the 'biners simple to clip. Bent gate on the bottom carabiner makes it easy to clip the rope while you're lead climbing. 'Biners are connected by durable Axess polyester slings. Rubber webbing protector at the bottom of the sling reduces abrasion while also keeping the rope-end carabiner properly positioned. Petzl Djinn Quickdraw Set is available in 12cm or 17cm lengths.
short_description: The Petzl Djinn Quickdraw Set is a reliable, durable solution for your initiation to outdoor climbing. It has a durable Axess sling and 2 Djinn carabiners with key lock noses for quick clipping.
